name: Annual Science Symposium
description: Join us for a comprehensive exploration of cutting-edge research in various scientific fields. Leading researchers will present their findings and discuss future directions in science and technology.

name: Cultural Festival 2024
description: Experience the rich diversity of our campus community through traditional performances, international food stalls, and interactive cultural exhibitions from around the world.

name: Basketball Championship Finals
description: Watch the most exciting basketball match of the season as our top teams compete for the championship title. Free entry for all students with ID.

name: Computer Science Department Seminar
description: Industry experts will discuss emerging trends in artificial intelligence and machine learning, with hands-on workshops and networking opportunities.

name: Poetry Reading Evening
description: An intimate evening of poetry readings by renowned poets and talented students. Come and enjoy the beauty of spoken word in a cozy atmosphere.

name: Research Methodology Workshop
description: Learn essential research methodologies and statistical analysis techniques. This comprehensive workshop is designed for graduate students and junior researchers.

name: Swimming Competition
description: Inter-university swimming competition featuring various categories for both beginners and advanced swimmers. Spectators welcome!

name: Business Department Career Fair
description: Meet with top employers, explore career opportunities, and network with industry professionals. Bring your resume and dress professionally.
